scripts.test: npm run build && WASM_LOG=warn TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_LOG=error RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.test:messages: npm run build && WASM_LOG=warn TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_LOG=error RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" ts-node src/messages.ts
scripts.test:stress: STRESS=true TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=debug RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:zomes && npm run build:dna && npm run build:app
scripts.build:zomes: cd ../dna && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && cd ../tests
